import React, { useRef, useState } from 'react' import api from '../api' import { v4 as uuidV4 } from 'uuid' import Login from "./Connection/Login"; import Register from "./Connection/Register"; class Connection extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { pseudo: '', password: '', isShowing: true } } toggle = () => { this.state.isShowing ? this.setState({ isShowing: false }) : this.setState({ isShowing: true }) } render() { const { pseudo, password } = this.state const idRef = useRef() function handleSubmit(e) { e.preventDefault() onIdSubmit(idRef.current.value) } function createNewId() { props.onIdSubmit(uuidV4()) } // Permets d'alterner entre la fenÃªtre de connexion et d'inscription const useModalWindows = () => { const [isShowingNewContact, setIsShowing] = useState(true); // Inverseur function toggleWindows() { setIsShowing(!isShowingNewContact) }; // Return return { isShowingNewContact, toggleWindows }; }; const { isShowingNewContact, toggleWindows } = useModalWindows(); return ( this.state.isShowing ?
